title: Active-duty Marine charged with assaulting police at US Capitol riot
description: An active-duty US Marine was arrested Thursday for allegedly participating in the deadly Capitol insurrection and charged with assaulting multiple police officers inside and outside the iconic building during the attack.

title: 'Daily Show' pokes fun at Trump loyalists with parody drug ad
description: Comedy Central's "The Daily Show" joked about Republicans who sound very different five months after the Capitol insurrection.

title: Ellen DeGeneres discussing her show ending with Oprah Winfrey couldn't be more perfect
description: It makes sense that with Ellen DeGeneres announcing she's ending her popular daytime show, she's choosing to talk about it with Oprah Winfrey.

title: Riots and mob violence sweep through Israeli cities following days of airstrikes and rocket attacks
description: As the Israeli military and Palestinian militants in Gaza exchange deadly airstrikes and rocket bombardments, rioting and violent clashes have also swept through several Israeli cities between Arab and Jewish citizens.

title: Liz Cheney outlines her next steps in aftermath of her ousting from leadership
Tesla may be much worse off in China than anyone thought
description: Tesla's Chinese sales last month were much weaker than they originally appeared.

title: New York Yankees say 7 vaccinated members test positive for Covid-19, but 6 are asymptomatic
description: Seven members of the New York Yankees' coaching and support staff have tested positive for Covid-19 despite being inoculated with the Johnson & Johnson vaccine, the baseball team's manager said.

title: Kerby Jean-Raymond will be the first Black American designer to present at Paris Couture Week
description: Kerby Jean-Raymond will become the first Black American designer to present at Paris Haute Couture Week, a significant moment in his ascent within the fashion industry.

title: People vaccinated against Covid-19 can go without masks indoors and outdoors, new CDC guidance says
Watch what Republican senators did after CDC's announcement
description: Republican senators celebrate by removing their masks on Capitol Hill after the CDC's latest guidance that fully vaccinated individuals can go maskless both indoors and outdoors.

title: Birkin bags hit record prices even as the world ground to a halt during Covid. Here's why
description: The desirability of an Hermès Birkin handbag -- a symbol of rarefied wealth -- is such that not even a global pandemic can dull demand for it. Instead, it has helped fire it up even more.

title: These kids are leading the way for Covid-19 vaccine research
description: CNN's Dr. Sanjay Gupta speaks with some of the kids taking part in a coronavirus vaccine clinical trial.

title: Biden won't rule out a retaliatory cyberattack on group responsible for pipeline hack and says Russia isn't to blame
description: President Joe Biden said Thursday he does not believe the Russian government was behind a cyberattack that shut down the pipeline supplying gasoline to the eastern US but said Moscow must do more to stop such attacks coming from Russia.

title: Dr. Gupta: How do you know who is vaccinated?
description: CNN's Dr. Sanjay Gupta discusses the CDC's announcement that fully vaccinated people go can without masks indoors and outdoors.

title: UK government 'anxious' as Covid variant first identified in India spreads
description: Prime Minister Boris Johnson admitted Thursday that his government was "anxious" about the coronavirus variant first identified in India, as the number of UK cases of the strain more than doubled in a week.

title: Latest 'Masked Singer' reveal is a first for the show
description: The identity of The Russian Dolls was revealed as a popular 1990s band on "The Masked Singer."

title: Gaetz ally plans to plead guilty and cooperate with prosecutors
description: The ex-Florida tax collector with close ties to Rep. Matt Gaetz is planning to plead guilty on Monday in a federal court in Florida, according to a new filing Thursday.

title: Legal analyst: This is the worst possible news for Gaetz
description: Joel Greenberg, the ex-Florida tax collector with close ties to Rep. Matt Gaetz (R-FL), is planning to plead guilty on Monday in a federal court in Florida, according to a new filing Thursday. CNN CNN legal analyst Elie Honig evaluates what this means for the federal sex trafficking case against Gaetz.

title: Israel warns of 'more targets' as clashes between Arabs and Jews rock Israeli cities
Weather reporter 'multiplies' in hilarious graphics error on live TV
description: Meteorologist Jennifer McDermed got caught in an on-air graphics error that "multiplied" her across the screen. She and her coworkers thought it was hilarious.

title: Ethereum co-founder donates $1 billion of shiba inu coin to India Covid relief
description: Ethereum co-founder Vitalik Buterin donated $1 billion worth of shiba inu coin — a dogecoin spinoff — to a Covid-19 relief fund in India.

title: The entire state of California is now in drought, just kindling waiting for an ignition
description: The title to the classic 1970s hit "It Never Rains in Southern California" has nothing to do with climate change or even precipitation for that matter, but it couldn't be more appropriate for the massive drought hitting the entire state this spring.

title: Hunger is spreading in Tigray, exacerbated by Eritrean troops blocking food aid
Alibaba's sales surge but cloud growth slows
description: Alibaba has reported earnings for the first time since China imposed a record fine on the tech giant — and the numbers were not as awful as some feared.

title: Marjorie Taylor Greene just sank to a new low
description: Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene obviously has a lot of time on her hands these days.

title: Global airlines cancel flights to Israel as violence escalates
description: Global airlines are canceling flights to Israel as clashes between the country's military and Palestinian militants in Gaza intensify.

title: Emotional Ellen DeGeneres announces her show is ending
description: Daytime talk show host Ellen DeGeneres will end her highly successful show in 2022. Watch her emotional announcement.

title: Prince Harry reveals secret supermarket meeting with Meghan
description: Prince Harry has spoken about the extent to which he and Meghan tried to keep their burgeoning relationship under wraps, how it felt to grow up in the media spotlight and his new life in the US.

title: Oprah reveals the 'inappropriate question' she once asked that makes her cringe
description: Oprah Winfrey is revealing that she once asked a celebrity a question that now makes her cringe.

title: University president resigns after plagiarizing speech
description: University of South Carolina president Bob Caslen resigned after admitting to plagiarizing part of a 2014 commencement speech given by former head of US Special Operations Command Admiral William McRaven.

title: The climate crisis is irrevocably damaging the world's oldest cave art
description: The handprints on the ceiling of an Indonesian cave are among the earliest known to archaeologists and date back 39,000 years.

title: Paralyzed man uses his mind to form real-time sentences
description: A man paralyzed from the neck down for almost a decade has used his mind to compose whole sentences in real-time, according to a new study.

title: McDonald's raises wages at company-owned restaurants
description: McDonald's is the latest restaurant to say it's raising wages in a bid to attract workers. The company is increasing hourly employees' pay by about 10%, it announced Thursday -- but the change applies only to a small percentage of staff.

title: Courtney Stodden accepts Chrissy Teigen's apology for social media bullying her
description: Courtney Stodden says she has accepted Chrissy Teigen's apology for bullying her on social media when Stodden was a teen, but is disputing that Teigen tried to reach out to her privately.

title: Explosion of Israeli-Palestinian violence poses a test for Biden
description: "Just when I thought I was out, they pull me back in."

title: Polestar wants to make a truly carbon neutral car. Here's why that won't be easy
description: Last month, Polestar, an electric vehicle maker that was spun off from Volvo, announced it will create a completely carbon neutral car, the Polestar 0, by 2030.

title: Ex-GOP lawmaker: I would be frightened to be around Taylor Greene
description: Former Republican US Representative Barbara Comstock says her party's future depends on following leaders like Rep. Liz Cheney (R-WY) rather than former President Donald Trump or Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene (R-GA).

title: Bitcoin's crash is bad news for other cryptos
description: Elon Musk's surprise reversal on accepting bitcoin payments for Tesla cars has triggered a sharp plunge in the cryptocurrency — spelling trouble for other coins that have notched shocking returns in recent months.

title: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar is proud of NBA's new social justice champion award, but worries US still faces 'the same issues'
description: On the court, six-time NBA champion and basketball Hall of Famer Kareem Abdul-Jabbar was famous for the goggles he used to play in.

title: Kids and the Covid-19 vaccine: A pediatrician answers safety questions
description: Teenagers between the ages of 12 and 15 years old can now be given the Pfizer/BioNTech coronavirus vaccine, the US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention said Wednesday.

title: More than 150 Republicans launch new political movement questioning Trump's role in GOP
description: A group of more than 150 Republicans, led by Donald Trump critics Evan McMullin and Miles Taylor, announced a new political movement that takes aim at former President Donald Trump's hold on the GOP and calls for a reform of the party.

title: 'Tonight we took the pulse of the market -- and it is clearly racing'
description: Two paintings by Jean-Michel Basquiat fetched a combined $144 million this week, heralding a return to normalcy for some of the world's wealthiest art collectors.

title: How to buy a €1 home in Sicily without ruining its culture
description: When Alexandra Stubbs heard a friend had bought one of Italy's infamous €1 houses, she felt a little rattled.

title: UEFA Champions League final moved from Istanbul to Porto amid travel restrictions
description: The Champions League final between Manchester City and Chelsea is to be played in Porto instead of Istanbul, European football's governing body UEFA said on Thursday.

title: Video shows mob violence breaking out in ​two Israel​i cities
description: Video shows ​mob violence between ​Arabs and Jews in ​two Israeli cities following days of air strikes and rocket attack​s. CNN's John Vause has more.

title: Olympic sponsor 'concerned' by growing public frustration over hosting Games
description: Toyota, one of the leading sponsors of this year's Olympic and Paralympic Games, says it's "concerned" with the amount of public frustration being directed at athletes ahead of the spectacle.

title: Tiger is still missing as mystery deepens over man who was seen with it
description: A man who wrangled a tiger strolling in front of a Houston home Sunday has posted bond over the incident, yet the circumstances of the scene that shocked neighbors and authorities remain unclear.

title: What we can learn from the greatest commencement speeches of all time
description: The annual blitz of commencement speeches is upon us. Steel yourself for pithy aphorisms, sage advice, and a dose of imposter syndrome from some of the greatest (or most famous) minds available to the US college system.

title: Soccer players affected by tear gas from outside stadium in Colombia
description: Players and staff from Colombian side Junior and Argentina's River Plate were left rubbing their eyes in discomfort after police fired tear gas at protesters outside the stadium ahead of their Copa Libertadores match in Barranquilla on Wednesday.

title: People are panic buying homes as prices skyrocket around the world
description: It wasn't long ago that real estate experts were bracing for the worst.

title: From Obama to De Niro: The greatest commencement speeches of all time
Cooper exposes the Republican Party with side-by-side video
description: CNN's Anderson Cooper reveals what's happening within the Republican Party, starting with the vote to remove Rep. Liz Cheney from House GOP leadership.

title: Qantas supermoon flight to nowhere sells out in 'record time'
description: Qantas is offering a new "flight to nowhere" that will give travel-starved Australian residents the chance to admire the late May supermoon and full lunar eclipse from over 40,000 feet in the sky.

title: Harry Styles' accent sets internet ablaze
description: Is that an American twang creeping into Harry Styles' speech? Jeanne Moos reports fans of Styles are riled.
